system.effect: Choose a Skill you have at Novice Rank or higher. Choose a specific use of that Skill; when rolling that skill under those circumstances, you may choose to roll one less dice, and instead add +6 to the result. You may take this Edge multiple times, choosing a different circumstance each time.
prerequisites: A Skill at Novice Rank or higher
system.name: Skill Stunt

ptu.prereqBackup: A Skill at Novice Rank or higher
